org.gridfour.imaging.palette

Class ColorPaletteRecordRGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gridfour.imaging.palette.ColorPaletteRecord
      • org.gridfour.imaging.palette.ColorPaletteRecordRGB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ColorPaletteRecord>

    public class ColorPaletteRecordRGB
extends ColorPaletteRecord
    Defines a color palette record based on the RGB model (sRGB model).

    This class interpolates RGB values using linear interpolation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorPaletteRecordRGB(double range0, double range1, Color rgb0, Color rgb1)
      Constructs a record for the specified ranges and selections of color using the RGB model.

      • ColorPaletteRecordRGB

        public ColorPaletteRecordRGB(double range0,
                             double range1,
                             Color rgb0,
                             Color rgb1)
        Constructs a record for the specified ranges and selections of color using the RGB model.
        Parameters:
        range0 - the minimum for the record's range of values
        range1 - the maximum for the record's range of values
        rgb0 - the color values associated with range0
        rgb1 - the color values associated with range1

    • Method Detail

      • getArgb

        public int getArgb(double z)
        Description copied from class: ColorPaletteRecord
        Gets an ARGB value for the specified parameter, if available. Implementations of this method generally expect that the value for z will be in the range of values that was specified to their constructor. The behavior of this method when supplied values out of range is undefined, though in many cases classes will simply constrain the input value to the supported range.
        Specified by:
        getArgb in class ColorPaletteRecord
        Parameters:
        z - a valid floating point value
        Returns:
        if a color is defined for z, its associated ARGB value; otherwise the null-value code.

      • getColor

        public Color getColor(double z)
        Description copied from class: ColorPaletteRecord
        Gets a Color instance for the specified parameter, if available. Implementations of this method generally expect that the value for z will be in the range of values that was specified to their constructor. The behavior of this method when supplied values out of range is undefined, though in many cases classes will simply constrain the input value to the supported range.
        Specified by:
        getColor in class ColorPaletteRecord
        Parameters:
        z - a valid floating point value
        Returns:
        if a color is defined for z, its associated ARGB value; otherwise the null-value code.

      • getBaseColor

        public Color getBaseColor()
        Description copied from class: ColorPaletteRecord
        Gets the color for the minimum value in the range specified by this record. This method is intended primarily to support categorical palettes. It can also be useful in creating legends and keys in graphical presentations.
        Specified by:
        getBaseColor in class ColorPaletteRecord
        Returns:
        a valid Color instance.
